mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_DB_CONN_I (USER_UID, DB_CONN_UID, DB_CONN_NM, DB_TYPE_CD, USERNAME, PASSWORD ,HOSTNAME, PORT, DB_CONN_TYPE_CD, DB_NM, DB_CONN_ROLE_CD, REG_DTM) VALUES (#{USER_UID}, uuid(), #{DB_CONN_NM}, #{DB_TYPE_CD}, #{USERNAME}, #{PASSWORD} ,#{HOSTNAME}, #{PORT}, #{DB_CONN_TYPE_CD}, #{DB_NM}, #{DB_CONN_ROLE_CD}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE /* conn.updateDbConn */ TB_DB_CONN_I SET DB_TYPE_CD = IFNULL(#{DB_TYPE_CD}, DB_TYPE_CD) ,DB_CONN_NM = IFNULL(#{DB_CONN_NM}, DB_CONN_NM) ,USERNAME = IFNULL(#{USERNAME}, USERNAME) ,PASSWORD = IFNULL(#{PASSWORD}, PASSWORD) ,HOSTNAME = IFNULL(#{HOSTNAME}, HOSTNAME) ,PORT = IFNULL(#{PORT}, PORT) ,DB_CONN_TYPE_CD = IFNULL(#{DB_CONN_TYPE_CD}, DB_CONN_TYPE_CD) ,DB_NM = IFNULL(#{DB_NM}, DB_NM) ,DB_CONN_ROLE_CD = IFNULL(#{DB_CONN_ROLE_CD}, DB_CONN_ROLE_CD) ,MOD_DTM = NOW() WHERE 1 = 1 AND DB_CONN_UID = #{DB_CONN_UID}
DELETE /* conn.deleteDbConn */ FROM TB_DB_CONN_I WHERE 1 = 1 AND DB_CONN_UID = #{DB_CONN_UID}

SELECT /* common.getYearCalendar */ YYYY_MM, CONCAT(YYYY_MM, '-', LPAD(B.NO, 2, '0')) YYYY_MM_DD ,LPAD(B.NO, 2, '0') DD ,DAYOFWEEK(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YYYY_MM, '-', LPAD(B.NO, 2, '0')), '%Y-%m-%d')) WEEK_DAY ,CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YYYY_MM, '-', LPAD(B.NO, 2, '0')), '%Y-%m-%d')) IN (7, 1) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END WORK_DAY_YN FROM ( SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'), '-', LPAD(A.NO, 2, '0')) YYYY_MM ,DATE_FORMAT(LAST_DAY(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'), '-', LPAD(A.NO, 2, '0')), '%Y-%m-%d')), '%d') DT_CNT FROM COPY_T A WHERE A.NO <= 12 ) A CROSS JOIN COPY_T B ON A.DT_CNT >= B.NO ORDER BY YYYY_MM_DD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CALENDAR SELECT YYYY_MM, CONCAT(YYYY_MM, '-', LPAD(B.NO, 2, '0')) YYYY_MM_DD ,LPAD(B.NO, 2, '0') DD ,DAYOFWEEK(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YYYY_MM, '-', LPAD(B.NO, 2, '0')), '%Y-%m-%d')) WEEK_DAY ,CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(YYYY_MM, '-', LPAD(B.NO, 2, '0')), '%Y-%m-%d')) IN (7, 1) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END WORK_DAY_YN FROM ( SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'), '-', LPAD(A.NO, 2, '0')) YYYY_MM ,DATE_FORMAT(LAST_DAY(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'), '-', LPAD(A.NO, 2, '0')), '%Y-%m-%d')), '%d') DT_CNT FROM COPY_T A WHERE A.NO <= 12 ) A CROSS JOIN COPY_T B ON A.DT_CNT >= B.NO ORDER BY YYYY_MM_DD
